properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM TAB_CS WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO , CATEGORY , BOARD_TITLE , USER_ID , BOARD_COUNT , REGIST_DATE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM TAB_CS C JOIN MEMBER M ON M.USER_NO = C.USER_NO WHERE C.STATUS = 'Y' ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
